query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: A system dynamic model (knowledge repository)
result.description: A system dynamics core model will be developed based on a review of existing public health models and previous systems approaches to childhood obesity, a consensus map drawing on all the system maps made in WP4, a translation of the consensus map into a stock and flow diagram, and quantification of the diagram using values from the literature and WP3.
